metadata.name: Malicious PowerShell Commandlets - ProcessCreation
metadata.comment: Detects Commandlet names from well-known PowerShell exploitation frameworks

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add-exfiltration')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add-persistence')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add-regbackdoor')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add-remoteregbackdoor')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add-scrnsavebackdoor')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('check-vm')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('convertto-rc4bytestream')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('decrypt-hash')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('disable-adidnsnode')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('disable-machineaccount')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('do-exfiltration')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('enable-adidnsnode')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('enable-machineaccount')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('enabled-duplicatetoken')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('exploit-jboss')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('export-adr')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('export-adrcsv')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('export-adrexcel')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('export-adrhtml')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('export-adrjson')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('export-adrxml')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('find-fruit')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('find-gpolocation')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('find-trusteddocuments')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('get-adidns')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('get-applicationhost')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('get-chromedump')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), output.summary: Detects Commandlet names from well-known PowerShell exploitation frameworks

metadata.objective: False positive: Unknown References: https://adsecurity.org/?p=2921, https://github.com/S3cur3Th1sSh1t/PowerSharpPack/tree/master/PowerSharpBinaries, https://github.com/BC-SECURITY/Invoke-ZeroLogon/blob/111d17c7fec486d9bb23387e2e828b09a26075e4/Invoke-ZeroLogon.ps1, https://github.com/xorrior/RandomPS-Scripts/blob/848c919bfce4e2d67b626cbcf4404341cfe3d3b6/Get-DXWebcamVideo.ps1, https://github.com/rvrsh3ll/Misc-Powershell-Scripts/blob/6f23bb41f9675d7e2d32bacccff75e931ae00554/OfficeMemScraper.ps1, https://github.com/dafthack/DomainPasswordSpray/blob/b13d64a5834694aa73fd2aea9911a83027c465a7/DomainPasswordSpray.ps1, https://unit42.paloaltonetworks.com/threat-assessment-black-basta-ransomware/, https://research.nccgroup.com/2022/06/06/shining-the-light-on-black-basta/, https://github.com/calebstewart/CVE-2021-1675, https://github.com/BloodHoundAD/BloodHound/blob/0927441f67161cc6dc08a53c63ceb8e333f55874/Collectors/AzureHound.ps1, https://bloodhound.readthedocs.io/en/latest/data-collection/azurehound.html, https://github.com/HarmJ0y/DAMP, https://github.com/samratashok/nishang, https://github.com/DarkCoderSc/PowerRunAsSystem/, https://github.com/besimorhino/powercat, https://github.com/Kevin-Robertson/Powermad, https://github.com/adrecon/ADRecon, https://github.com/adrecon/AzureADRecon
